description.en:
The DeFi Platform for Decentralized Entertainment World.  

The global pandemic has pushed industries to change rapidly, and Fan8 is the next evolution in the entertainment industry in fostering meaningful connections between artists and their fans. Fan8 was developed to help artists/Idols across the world to perform and earn a living more easily, while the holders of Fan8 tokens (including idols) are able to earn a form of Universal basic income. Through the unique organization of collective events/activities fostered by a thriving partnership of artists/idols, fans, local community member and investors, Fan8 provides an unprecedented opportunity for sustained long-term relationships in the entertainment field using the online format
